attributes.action: Official Recognition of Captain Tom Moore's exemplary fundraising effort for NHS
attributes.additional_details: The Incredible and selfless efforts of Captain Tom Moore in raising Millions of pounds in funds for The NHS in their time of great need as they selflessly battle to save lives and protect us all from COVID-19. I feel that Captain Tom, as a man who is both a WW2 Veteran and also about to celebrate his 100th Birthday deserves some official recognition and royal commendation.
attributes.background: The Incredible and selfless efforts of Captain Tom Moore in raising Millions of pounds in funds for The NHS in their time of great need. I feel that Captain Tom, as a man who is both a WW2 Veteran and also about to celebrate his 100th Birthday deserves some official recognition and a commendation

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
